title: ivern if the god willow didn't pacify him
body:
just a thought after reading his lore
a reality skin where the god willows influence didn't change ivern
a corrupt tree would be his look with
-rotten parts
- timer on camps having bear traps as well as other animal traps 
-Q looking like a spear
-E looking like a mace ball 
-daisy as a chained golem with shackles being her counter

replies.body:
oops thanks for the fix and here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kwzmjx0pZqM is his lore for the lazy
for me he owns the jg 57% win ratio in norms and 100% in rank atm all up about 70 odd games so much fun
I think you mean to say 'lore' not 'law' :^)
What law. What the hell is is iverns law?? its not the law of the jungle, thats for sure
